Package io.artframework

Interface ConfigMap

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConfigMap
    public interface ConfigMap
    The ConfigMap is an immutable class that holds information about the mapping between fields in a (config) class to their given values provided by a list of KeyValuePairs.

    The class that creates a config map must use the ConfigOption annotation to provide the required information about its fields to this ConfigMap.

    The ConfigMap makes heavy use of the ConfigUtil class to parse and map the provided fields and values. Use it if you just need partial mapping functions.

    See Also:
    ConfigOption, ConfigUtil

    • Method Detail

      • of

        static ConfigMap of​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​ConfigFieldInformation> configFields)
        Creates a new config map from the provided field to config field information mapping.

        Use the ConfigUtil.getConfigFields(Class) method to get the field information or directly use the of(Class) method in this class.

        Parameters:
        configFields - the config fields for the config map
        Returns:
        the new default config map

      • of

        static ConfigMap of​(java.lang.Class<?> configClass)
             throws ConfigurationException
        Creates a new config map for the provided class extracting the fields.
        Parameters:
        configClass - the config class to create a config map for
        Returns:
        the new default config map instance
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the config fields in the class are not configured correctly

      • loaded

        boolean loaded()
        Returns:
        true if the config map has been loaded with(List) config values

      • configFields

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​ConfigFieldInformation> configFields()
        Returns:
        the raw field name to config field information mapping

      • with

        ConfigMap with​(@NonNull
               @NonNull java.util.List<KeyValuePair> keyValuePairs)
        throws ConfigurationException
        Loads the config map with the given key value pairs mapping them to the correct config fields.

        The map can be loaded multiple times but the last call will always override and erase all prior config values.

        Parameters:
        keyValuePairs - the list of key value pairs that should be loaded into this config map
        Returns:
        a new config map with the loaded key value pairs. loaded() is now true.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the provided list of key value pairs cannot be mapped to this config, e.g. if required fields are missing from the value list.

      • resolve

        default ConfigMap resolve​(@NonNull
                          @NonNull Scope scope)
        Resolves all values in this config map using the provided scope.

        All config fields that are tagged with @Resolve and not primitive values will be resolved using the registered Resolver.

        Values in this config map can only resolve after they were provided with(List).

        Parameters:
        scope - the scope used when resolving the values of this config map. must not be null.
        Returns:
        a new config map instance with the resolved values

      • resolve

        ConfigMap resolve​(@NonNull
                  @NonNull Scope scope,
                  @Nullable
                  Target<?> target,
                  @Nullable
                  ExecutionContext<?> context)
        Resolves all values in this config map using the provided scope.

        All config fields that are tagged with @Resolve and not primitive values will be resolved using the registered Resolver.

        Values in this config map can only resolve after they were provided with(List).

        If an ExecutionContext is provided all variables that are strings or primitive types will be replaced using the ${key} syntax before resolving the config map.

        Parameters:
        scope - the scope used when resolving the values of this config map. must not be null.
        target - the target of the resolution. can be null.
        context - the execution context that called the resolution. can be null.
        Returns:
        a new config map instance with the resolved values

      • applyTo

        <TConfig> TConfig applyTo​(@NonNull
                          TConfig config)
        Applies the loaded and mapped config values of this config map to the given config instance.

        Will inject the mapped fields with the values provided from with(List) into the config.

        The config object is not altered if the config values have not been provided by calling with(List).

        Type Parameters:
        TConfig - the type of the config
        Parameters:
        config - the config that should have its config fields injected
        Returns:
        the provided config instance
